column1: Your query : ((TITLE-ABS-KEY("subjective social mobility") OR TITLE-ABS-KEY("perceived social mobility") OR TITLE-ABS-KEY("perception of social mobility") OR TITLE-ABS-KEY("perceptions of social mobility") OR TITLE-ABS-KEY("subjective mobility" AND ( "social mobility" OR "intergenerational mobility" ))) AND ( LIMIT-TO ( DOCTYPE,"ar" ) OR LIMIT-TO ( DOCTYPE,"bk" ) OR LIMIT-TO ( DOCTYPE,"ch" ) ) )
